text: Raúl Manuel Grijalva (; February 19, 1948 - March 13, 2025) was an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for , serving from 2003 until 2025. He was a member of the Democratic Party. In April 2024, Grijalva announced that he had been diagnosed with lung cancer. He died in Tucson, Arizona from the disease on March 13, 2025, at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== *U.S. Congressman Raul Grijalva official U.S. House site *Raúl Grijalva for Congress * * Category:1948 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Politicians from Tucson, Arizona Category:United States representatives from Arizona Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Deaths from lung cancer
title: Raúl Grijalva
